div.p: This value set does not contain a fixed number of concepts

Codes identifying atomic results of observations when value is type codeableConcept. This value set includes all the children of SNOMED CT Concepts from SCTIDs 404684003 Clinical finding (finding), 410607006 Organism (organism),362981000 Qualifier value (qualifier value), 105590001 Substance (substance), and 123037004 Body structure (body structure). It is provided as a suggestive example

Copyright Statement: This value set includes content from SNOMED CT, which is copyright © 2002+ International Health Terminology Standards Development Organisation (IHTSDO), and distributed by agreement between IHTSDO and HL7. Implementer use of SNOMED CT is not covered by this agreement
This value set includes codes defined in other code systems, using the following rules:

ul.li: Include codes from http://snomed.info/sct where concept is-a 404684003Include codes from http://snomed.info/sct where concept is-a 410607006Include codes from http://snomed.info/sct where concept is-a 362981000Include codes from http://snomed.info/sct where concept is-a 105590001Include codes from http://snomed.info/sct where concept is-a 123037004

publisher.value: HL7 International - Orders and Observations WG
